comment.author: 53575715@N02
comment._content: The caption reads: "Spectres Sidéraux: 1) Soleil 2) α Orion 3) Aldébaran 4) Sirius 5) Rigel 6) Pollux 7) Nébuleuse d'Orion". The star α Orion is also known as Betelgeuse. I wrote a blog post about this image and spectroscopy at www.strudel.org.uk/blog/astro/001041.shtml
